entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 30 percent chance of showers. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High 9. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 21 April 2023
